title: Angst for the Memories
description: Rhythmically wonderful, stunningly visual, and brilliantly metaphorical, Rachel Daigh's poems capture the ups, downs, trials, and tribulations that accompany us through life. Angst for the Memories is a collection of poetry written over the span of nine years. The chronological order of Rachel's poetry allows us to recognize the hard times, notice the struggles, read of the resolutions, and see the growth as she shares her world with us through her poems. Whether you are in the mood for something happy, hopeful, a bit melancholy, or if you are hurting or want a wonderful toast for your friends and loves ones, Angst for the Memories has a poem to accompany you through it all.
author: Rachel Daigh
